sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		AddressID as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		City as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20),
	filePattern:'undefined') ~> sink1

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
